titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Office of Communications
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Office of Communications FA1666

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-11-01 04:58:07 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Office of Communications

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by file type or originating officer. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Primarily consists of office files, photographic materials and press materials.
